Sam, Clover, and Alex were up in the Attic at Alex's house helping Alex clean in out. while Alex was sorting through some junk, she came across a childish looking book that had her name on it. upon opening it she found that it was an old album with pictures of her as a baby.

Alex: "hey, check this out."

Sam and Clover came over and began looking through pictures with Alex, commenting on her cuteness and how funny she is in the pictures. suddenly they were blinded by a bright flash of light that lasted for a few seconds, when they were able to focus their vision again they were surprised to find that the pictures had changed, instead of baby Alex in the pictures it was now normal Alex in the baby pictures.

1513323212111112221112.content:
Sam, clover, and Alex (clover more than the others) were surprised when Jerry told them he set up the assignment at school. when they asked why, Jerry revealed that he felt that they weren't taking their spy work seriously.

Jerry then told them that he's made special Gadgets for their current situation if he calls them for a mission, showing a few of them for examples.

super inflatable airbag diapers for if they fall from a really high place, a pacifier known as a bungee binkies similar to their usual bungee cord belts, jet pack diaper pack, and in place of their usual com-powders they get "toy-coms" that resemble baby toy cellphones.

1513323212111112222.title: what the rules for the assignment were

15133232121111122221.content:
Rule 1: the girls will be required to call their mothers "mommy" instead of "mom"
Rule 2. the girls will only be allowed to use their diapers instead of a toilet (exception a training potty)
Rule 3 Sam, Clover, and Alex will be dressed by their mother's every day.
Rule 4. the school has reserved some locations so the "babies" can go out in public and still be babied.
Rule 5. if the "babies" misbehave or break rules, the babies will be punished.

were there any other rules?

Over the amount of time the spies have lived in their shared beach house, they have renovated their bathroom to have a hot tub that doubles as a bathtub. The first thing the girls decided to do to get used to being babied and babying each other was to take a bath together.

After Sam turned on the water to fill the tub, the girls stripped out of their clothes until they were naked as the day they were born. Once the tub was filled up, the spies got into the tub.

Once in the tub, the spies...

info.brief_description: The girls of Totally Spies are turned back into babies. I leave why to you.
info.description:
The girls, or their mothers, or other ladies are turned back into infants.
Rules.
No death, gore, sex, drugs and so on. Mental or physical regression is allowed. Anything gross stays in the diapers.
